name: RejsekortPrintable
description: Make the Danish "Rejsekort" (travel card) self service pages considerably more printer friendly.  Eliminates the worst cases of waste of space and makes better use of available page width (but still requires a sensible minimum if you want to see everything).

user.name: dknyt
user.about: Danish Firefox user on Fedora Linux

additional_info:
Comment in the last two "table" lines if you want to hide the "+" column in the travel history.
Note that this will also hide all of the text of any such expanded entry (the travel details).

Changelog:

* 20170602 r1.1.0: Remove empty space at bottom of pages

* 20151219 r1.0.0: First public release
